trans-unit.source: Represents a converter that converts the dimensions of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control into a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示的尺寸轉換轉換器<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>控制項放入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> created by this converter applies an <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> so that it does not appear in the area defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>所建立轉換器會套用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>，讓它不會出現在已定義的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>範圍</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border></xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OpacityMask%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.BorderGapMaskConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.BorderGapMaskConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> that draws the border for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>繪製的框線<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The three numbers that are in the `values` parameter represent the following <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> control parameters: - The width of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: 中的三個數字`values`參數代表下列<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>控制參數:-的寬度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox><xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>
-寬度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>
-高度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration provides a graphical representation of the `values` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下圖提供的圖形表示法`values`參數。

trans-unit.source: ![A GroupBox and the valiues for the Convert method](~/add/media/bordergapmaskconverterillustration.png "A GroupBox and the valiues for the Convert method")
trans-unit.target: ![GroupBox 與 Convert 方法的值](~/add/media/bordergapmaskconverterillustration.png "GroupBox 與 Convert 方法的值")

trans-unit.source: An array of three numbers that represent the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control parameters.
trans-unit.target: 三個數字，代表陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>控制參數。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 >。
未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: The width of the visible line to the left of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 左邊的可見行的寬度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>中<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>
未使用此參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> that draws the border around a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control that includes a gap for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref>繪製周圍的框線<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref>包含間距控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>
未實作。
